select normal_id as normalId, name, birth, nickname as nickName, mobile, profile, postnum as postNum, address1, address2, xpoint, ypoint, gender, email, regdate as regDate, mypoint as myPoint, root from normal_user where normal_id = #{id} and pass = #{pass}
